titleStmt.title: An exclamation to all those that love the Lord Jesus in sincerity against an apology written by an ingenious person, for Mr. Cowley's lascivious and prophane verses / by a dutiful son of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
